TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WsFederationConfiguration extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含 WS-Federation 身份验证模块需要的所有配置设置 ()。

span.span: Contains all of the configuration settings needed by the WS-Federation Authentication Module ().

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例设置的类通过访问的对象属性包含用于初始化的 WS 联合身份验证模块 (WSFAM) 和控件的属性的设置其行为。An instance of the class that is set on the object accessed through the property contains the settings that are used to initialize the properties of the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM) and control its behavior. 这些设置通常从加载``配置文件中的元素。These settings are typically loaded from the `` element in the configuration file.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.WSFederationElement federationElement) cil managed

param.name: federationElement
param.span: 要从新实例初始化的 元素。

span.span: The element from which to initialize the new instance.

summary.span: 从指定的 元素来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据指定的设置将初始化新实例的属性``元素。The properties of the new instance are initialized according to the settings of the specified `` element. 执行一些验证指定对象`federationElement`。Some validation is performed on the object specified by `federationElement`. 这两个属性和属性必须指定非 null、 非空值。Both the property and the property must specify non-null, non-empty values. 如果属性设置`true`、属性必须指定一个 URI，有一套 HTTPS 方案。If the property is set `true`, the property must specify a URI that has an HTTPS scheme. 属性不能为负数。The property cannot be negative. 如果不满足任何这些条件，则引发异常。If any of these conditions are not met, an exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string issuer, string realm) cil managed
Public Sub New (issuer As String, realm As String)

param.name: issuer
param.span: 包含 WS-Federation 身份验证模块 (WSFAM) 使用的颁发者 URI 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the URI of the issuer to be used by the WS-Federation Authentication Module (WSFAM).

param.name: realm
param.span: 包含 WSFAM 使用的请求领域的 URI 的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the URI of the requesting realm to be used by the WSFAM.

summary.span: 使用指定的颁发者和领域来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified issuer and realm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性初始化为根据`issuer`和`realm`参数。The and properties are initialized according to the `issuer` and `realm` parameters. 所有其他属性将初始化为其默认值。All other properties are initialized to their default values.

span.span: is .
-or-
is .

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the wauth parameter to use in WS-Federation sign-in requests ("wsignin1.0").

value.span: 一个认证类型的 URI。

span.span: A URI that specifies the authentication type.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.
